status.enabled: Task is enabled and will run on schedule.
status.disabled: Task is disabled and will not run.
status.failed: Task failed on its last run.
status.stopping: Task is stopping and will be disabled after the current run finishes.

jobInfo.title: Job Information
jobInfo.emptyMessage: Job details will appear here when an operation starts

stats.emptyMessage: Statistics will be shown when an operation is running

rcloneUpdate.channelSaveFailed: Failed to save rclone update channel
rcloneUpdate.settingsSaveFailed: Failed to save rclone update settings

tray_enabled.label: Enable Tray Icon
tray_enabled.description: Show an icon in the system tray. Also enables the background service.

language.label: Language
language.description: Language to use for the user interface.

start_on_startup.label: Start on Startup
start_on_startup.description: Automatically start the app when the system starts.

restrict.label: Restrict Values
restrict.description: Restrict some specific values for security purposes (e.g., Token, Client ID, etc.)

max_tray_items.label: Max Tray Items
max_tray_items.description: Maximum number of items to show in the tray (1-40).

rclone_path.label: Rclone Binary Path
rclone_path.description: Path to rclone binary or directory. Leave empty for auto-detection.

bandwidth_limit.label: Bandwidth Limit
bandwidth_limit.description: Limit the bandwidth used by Rclone transfers. Format: 'upload:download'

completed_onboarding.label: Completed Onboarding
completed_onboarding.description: Indicates if the onboarding process is completed.

log_level.label: Log Level
log_level.description: Controls which log messages are recorded. Higher levels include more detail.

destroy_window_on_close.label: Memory Optimization
destroy_window_on_close.description: Destroys the window UI when closed to free RAM. Experimental feature.

app_skipped_updates.label: Skipped App Updates
app_skipped_updates.description: List of application versions that have been skipped.

rclone_skipped_updates.label: Skipped Rclone Updates
rclone_skipped_updates.description: List of rclone versions that have been skipped.

default_layout.label: Default Layout
default_layout.description: Default view layout for the file browser.

grid_icon_size.label: Grid Icon Size
grid_icon_size.description: Preferred grid icon size in pixels.

list_icon_size.label: List Icon Size
list_icon_size.description: Preferred list icon size in pixels.

show_hidden_items.label: Show Hidden Files
show_hidden_items.description: Show files starting with a dot by default in the file browser.

development.title: Development Build
development.subtitle: Features may be unstable • Data loss possible • Not for production use

flatpak.title: Flatpak Note
flatpak.subtitle: Some features may require manual permission adjustments.

metered.message: You are on a metered connection. Some features may use extra data.

connection.online: Your internet connection is working properly.
connection.offline: Cannot connect to: {{services}}. Some features may not work as expected. Click to retry.

welcome.title: Welcome to RClone Manager
welcome.content: Your modern cloud storage management solution. RClone Manager provides an intuitive interface to sync, mount, and manage all your cloud remotes effortlessly.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.content: Seamlessly sync files, mount cloud storage as local drives, manage multiple remotes, and monitor transfer operations - all from one beautiful interface.

installRclone.title: Install RClone
installRclone.content: RClone is required for cloud storage operations. Choose your preferred installation location or binary location and we'll handle the setup automatically.

installPlugin.title: Install Mount Plugin
installPlugin.content: The mount plugin enables you to mount cloud storage as local drives. This optional component enhances your RClone experience.

selectConfig.title: Select RClone Config
selectConfig.content: Choose the RClone configuration file to use: the default location or a custom configuration file.

passwordRequired.title: Configuration Password Required
passwordRequired.content: Your rclone configuration is encrypted. Please enter the password to unlock it for this session.

ready.title: Ready to Go!
ready.content: Everything is set up and ready to use. RClone Manager will help you manage your cloud storage with ease. Click 'Get Started' to begin your journey.

validation.completeInstallation: Please complete the installation options above
validation.selectConfig: Please select or provide a valid config option first

errors.invalidPath: Please enter a valid absolute path

default.description: Use the default rclone config file location.
default.recommendation: Select this if you don't have a custom config.

custom.description: Select a custom rclone config file.

empty.activeHint: Transfers will appear here when an operation starts
empty.recentHint: Completed transfers will appear here when jobs finish

overviewHeader.backendSwitchAria: Current mode: {{title}} - Click to switch backend

hints.encodingFlags: Select one or more encoding flags
hints.bandwidth: Bandwidth limit in KiB/s, or use suffix B|K|M|G|T|P or full timetable format

vfsControl.title: VFS Control
vfsControl.noVfsRunning: No VFS instances are running for this remote.
vfsControl.indexedWarning: This VFS instance has an index suffix (e.g., {{suffix}}) which is not supported by rclone's VFS API. This is a known limitation when multiple mounts exist for the same remote.
vfsControl.learnMore: Learn more on the rclone forum →

queue.title: Upload Queue
queue.emptyHint: Files are uploaded automatically based on VFS cache mode
queue.name: Name

cacheInfo.title: Cache Information
cacheInfo.noteText: "Clear Metadata" only removes directory listings cache. Cached files remain in the cache directory until rclone purges them automatically.

default.description: Use the default rclone config located in the standard path.
default.recommendation: Choose the default config unless you have a custom configuration file.

custom.description: Select a custom rclone configuration file.

existing.description: If you have a custom rclone binary, select it here.

default.description: Install rclone to the system location automatically.
default.recommendation: This is the recommended option for most users.

custom.description: Choose a custom location to install rclone.
custom.label: Installation Path

existing.description: Select an existing rclone binary path on your system.
existing.label: Binary Path

remoteConfig.invalidStart: Name cannot start with a dash or space
remoteConfig.invalidEnd: Name cannot end with a space
remoteConfig.nameTaken: A remote with this name already exists
remoteConfig.setupSubtitle: Complete the setup for this remote
remoteConfig.nextQuestionHelp: Answer the next question to continue.
remoteConfig.serveDescription: Select the remote path you want to serve. You can serve the entire remote or a specific folder.
remoteConfig.operationDescription: Configure source, destination, and auto-start options for this operation.

appOperation.scheduleDescription: When enabled, this operation will run recurring based on the cron schedule below.
appOperation.mountDestMustBeLocal: Mount destination must be a local folder
appOperation.completionNote: Note: Remote path completion available after creation of the remote.
appOperation.noItemsFound: No items found in this directory.
appOperation.advancedHelp: Configure individual cron fields or enter a complete cron expression manually.
appOperation.timezoneNote: Times are in your local timezone (UTC{{timezone}}) and automatically converted to UTC for scheduling.

restore.title: Restore Backup
restore.encryptedWarning: This backup is encrypted. Enter the correct password to decrypt and restore.

errors.passwordEmpty: Password cannot be empty or whitespace
errors.passwordLength: Password must be at least 4 characters
errors.integrityFailed: Backup file is corrupted or has been tampered with.
errors.verificationFailed: File verification failed. The backup may be corrupted.
errors.requiresPassword: This backup requires a password to decrypt.
errors.decryptFailed: Failed to decrypt backup. Check your password.

updates.installSuccess: Update installed. Please restart the app.

updates.channelChanged: Update channel changed to {{channel}}. Check for updates to apply.

properties.title: Properties
properties.noHashTypes: No hash types supported for this remote

fileViewer.previewNotAvailable: Preview not available for this file type

appDetail.moveWarningText1: Files will be deleted from the source after successful transfer to destination.
appDetail.moveWarningText2: Ensure you have backups before proceeding with move operations.
appDetail.bisyncInfoText1: Bidirectional synchronization keeps both locations synchronized.
appDetail.bisyncInfoText2: Changes made to either location will be reflected in the other.
appDetail.bisyncInfoText3: First run may take longer as it establishes the sync baseline.
appDetail.sharedSettingsDesc: Applies to all operations, regardless of sync or mount mode.
appDetail.syncBehave: Adjust how the {{op}} process behaves. Multi-profile supported.
appDetail.serveBehave: Configure serving protocols (HTTP, FTP, etc). Multi-profile supported.
appDetail.mountBehave: Configure mount behavior and virtual file system tuning.

noResults.title: No shortcuts found
noResults.description: Try searching for a different term or clear your search.

rclonePath.message: The Rclone binary could not be found or started. You can reinstall it now.

rclonePassword.title: Rclone Configuration Password Required
rclonePassword.message: Your rclone configuration requires a password to access encrypted remotes.

mountPlugin.title: Mount Plugin Problem
mountPlugin.message: The mount plugin could not be found or started. You can reinstall or repair it now.

shutdown.title: Shutting Down
shutdown.message: Please wait while the application shuts down safely...

about.title: About
about.restartDescription: An update has been installed. Please restart the application to apply the changes.
about.ackText: This application is built with modern web technologies and relies on the excellent Rclone project for cloud storage management.
about.licenseText1: This application is free and open source software distributed under the
about.licenseText2: This program comes with no warranty. You are free to use, modify, and distribute this software according to the GPL v3 license terms.
about.thirdPartyText: This application includes various third-party libraries and components, each with their own licensing terms. See the project repository for a complete list.

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.restartRequiredDesc: The following changes require an engine restart to take effect:

validation.integer: Must be a valid whole number.
validation.max: Value must be no more than {{val}}.
validation.invalidPath: Please enter a valid absolute file path.
validation.urlArray: All items must be valid URLs (e.g., https://...).

aria.resetAll: Reset all settings to default values

preferences.pendingChangesTooltip: You have {{count}} unsaved changes that require engine restart. Click to scroll to them.
